column4: how can i use my swap? i have not created a swap partition on install -.- yes it hurts ;-) but now i have created a new swap with partition magic. how can i use it now? because i dont want to reinstall ubuntu
i think you can go to System|Administration|Drives
run sudo gedit /etc/fstab in terminal and then put the line /dev/hda5 none swap sw 0 0 in there
